title: Quarkus OIDC Cannot Discovery When use Programmatically Resolving Tenants Configuration
body:
### Describe the bug

1、will got error when bootstrap
```yaml
quarkus:
     oidc:
        enabled: true
        tenant-id: master
        tenant-enabled: true
        auth-server-url: http://localhost:18080
```
```log
2023-02-14 15:17:47,501 WARN  [io.qua.config] (Quarkus Main Thread) Unrecognized configuration key "quarkus.datasource.reactive" was provided; it will be ignored; verify that the dependency extension for this configuration is set or that you did not make a typo

        at io.quarkus.oidc.common.runtime.OidcCommonUtils.lambda$discoverMetadata$2(OidcCommonUtils.java:406)

        at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:833)
```


2、Dit not discovery on provide a OidcConfig
```java

@ApplicationScoped
public class OrgTenantConfigResolver implements TenantConfigResolver {
    private static final String ORG_CODE_HEADER_NAME = "X-ORG-CODE";
    private final OrgService orgService;

    @Inject
    public OrgTenantConfigResolver(OrgService orgService) {
        this.orgService = orgService;
    }

    @Override
    public Uni<OidcTenantConfig> resolve(RoutingContext routingContext,
                                         OidcRequestContext<OidcTenantConfig> requestContext) {
        return requestContext.runBlocking(() -> loadOidcTenantConfig(routingContext));
    }

    private OidcTenantConfig loadOidcTenantConfig(RoutingContext routingContext) {
        var org = loadOrg(routingContext);
        String authServerUrl = ConfigProvider.getConfig().getValue("quarkus.oidc.auth-server-url", String.class);
        OidcTenantConfig config = new OidcTenantConfig();
        config.setTenantId(org.getRealm());
        config.setTenantEnabled(true);
        config.setAuthServerUrl(String.format("%s/realms/%s", authServerUrl, org.getRealm()));
        config.setDiscoveryEnabled(true);
        return config;
    }

    private OrgEntity loadOrg(RoutingContext routingContext) {
        return orgService.searcher().findOrPrimary(loadOrgCode(routingContext))
            .orElseThrow(OrgMessages.INSTANCE::primaryNotFound);
    }

    private String loadOrgCode(RoutingContext routingContext) {
        return Optional.ofNullable(routingContext)
            .map(RoutingContext::request)
            .map(request -> request.getHeader(ORG_CODE_HEADER_NAME)).orElse(null);
    }
}
```

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_
